text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump This one was a complete and total train wreck.

 Dear Mr. Trump: antibiotics don't work against COVID-19 because it is a virus, and antibiotics work against bacteria (and some fungi). Sincerely, Every 5th Grader in America
